chapter.title: Useful Software
chapter.para: This is a list of other software that users might find useful in conjunction with Geeqie.

section.title: Unison
section.para: Unison allows two replicas of a collection of files and directories to be stored on different hosts (or different disks on the same host), modified separately, and then brought up to date by propagating the changes in each replica to the other. It is available in some distributions. This is the project site: https://github.com/bcpierce00/unison/

section.title: Geeqie Cache Maintenance
section.para: Command line program to automatically create or update thumbnails and similarity data: geeqie-cache-maintenance

section.title: Keyword Merge
section.para: This program will merge the keyword tree of one Geeqie configuration file into another. The keyword trees are simply concatenated. When Geeqie loads the resulting configuration file, any duplicates are discarded: keyword_merge.sh

section.title: Install Geeqie from sources on Debian
section.para: This script will clone the Geeqie repository, fulfill all dependencies, and install Geeqie on a Debian based system: geeqie-install-debian.sh

section.title: Generic install script
section.para: This script will install Geeqie to a defined location, and will run under any system. However, it is left to you to make sure dependencies are fulfilled: build-geeqie

section.title: Decoder for .sim files
section.para: This program is unlikely to be of interest to most users. It shows a summary of the contents of a .sim file. (Requires perl to be installed): decode_sim
